entry.title: Linked
entry.summary:
Author: Miss_Salt

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,933Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 27

Summary: After discovering the Order of the Guardians temple ruins, Talia Al-Ghul took it upon herself to hunt down the Grand Guardian of the miraculous. Upon locating Master Wang Fu, Talia tortured the feeble man into relinquishing Guardianship of the Miracle Box to her. Before relinquishing Guardianship, Wang Fu informed Talia that the miraculous could only be wielded by the reincarnations of previous miraculous wielders. In other words, Talia wouldn’t be able to wield the miraculous herself and thus, wouldn’t be able to access the wish she desired. However, as the newly appointed Grand Guardian, Talia was privy to the identities of the designated miraculous wielders. Talia first discovered the identity of the Ladybug miraculous wielder, whose name didn’t ring a bell. Talia then moved on to discover the identity of the Black Cat mirauclous wielder, who, in a twist of luck, turned out to be her own son. An underlying sense of dread accompanied Talia’s excitement as she recalled what Wang Fu had told her before his untimely death- that the souls of the Black Cat and Ladybug miraculous wielders were linked. Talia hoped the Ladybug miraculous wielder, Marienette Dupain-Cheng, would be a worthy partner for Damian.

entry.title: Academic Misconduct
entry.summary:
Author: NeZepellini

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 42,880Chapters: 10/35Kudos: 64

Summary: Life is not going as planned for Marinette Dupain-Chang. When she was 14, she'd honestly thought that by now she'd be a famous fashion designer and she'd be living out the rest of her life with Adrien in all her hamster-loving glory. At 25, all she wants to do is get her MBA and launch MDC to new heights. No romance, unnecessary rivals, or convoluted plans. When life just seems to get in the way, she isn't sure what to do. Or, where Marinette fake-dates Damian, someone she cannot stand for the life of her, until it doesn't feel like fake-dating anymore. This is my take on a character study. I just want to warn people that Marinette isn't a good person, far from it. She is flawed, she does a lot of shitty things, but there are consequences. Overall, this fic focuses on her personality traits and exaggerates them slightly to show really how they impact her life. I want to apologise for any butchering of the characters I may do (It's not an excuse), but I do have reasons for doing so. Updates on the first of every month (for now, update rate may increase as time goes on.)

entry.title: I Got Isekai’d Into Miraculous—Now They Want Me to Break the Love-Square?! Tch. I’m a Robin. I’ll Fix It My Way.
entry.summary:
Author: krono20112025

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 151,312Chapters: 60/?Kudos: 469

Summary: Five years Damian waited for the last Miraculous Ladybug manga, and the ending sucks. Enraged, he boasted he could write a better story. A mischievous, fourth-dimensional imp quickly appears and gives him a chance to prove his claim. To prevent a disappointing ending, he must change the plot as he sees fit. What would a genius detective, Robin, do in the MLB Universe, to cause Chaos of course! ​He wakes up in a world where he is dead, but Alfred is his living ally. With just seven days until the plot kicks off, Damian dedicates himself to healing the fractured Batfamily, slowly putting the pieces back together. But he can multitask. To prevent the Love Square, he decides to aggressively befriend Marinette Dupain-Cheng the only way a Wayne knows how: by replacing her friends with competent ones and burying her under a mountain of gifts. Who knew purchasing platonic affection required so much cashmere?

entry.title: Lie Lie Lie
entry.summary:
Author: krono20112025

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 139,215Chapters: 49/80Kudos: 678

Summary: Marinette Dupain-Cheng had a grand falling out with Adrien. He had learned the truth, that his father was Hawk Moth and his girlfriend had kept this secret. Chrysalis was dead,her life was spiraling out of despair. Her Maman let her leave with her Uncle Wang, but not to Shanghai. Hey, there is another restaurant opening in Gotham, and Uncle Wang needed a helper. Goodbye, City of Love, and welcome, Capital City of Crime. __________________________________________________________________ Damian Wayne does not get “dumped”. However, given the Wayne Gala is close and his brothers plan to make fun of his being alone, Damian needs a plan of action: a pretend girlfriend. The target? His friend, Maps Mizoguchi. Approaching the raven-haired under the tree, he gives the order for a romantic alliance. But when the girl turns around, it’s not Maps. It’s a confused French transfer student holding a macaron. A lesser man would apologize for the mistake. Damian Wayne? He doubles down. She has the right hair. She is a variable he can control. “You,” he decides, refusing to admit error. “You are an acceptable substitute. Don’t be late.”

entry.title: Defenders of the Universe
entry.summary:
Author: aldanavroon

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,953Chapters: 20/?Kudos: 194

Summary: In a universe where divine forces walk reborn among mortals, balance is everything—and it’s breaking. The ancient Order of Guardians has fallen. Chaos stirs. And four Souls, once meant to appear one at a time, have returned all at once. Creation. Destruction. Lie. Intuition. They’re not ready. They’re not trusted. And one of them looks a little too much like someone Batman once called his son. As legends rise and secrets unravel, the fate of the multiverse may rest on the shoulders of children—ones who carry the weight of gods.

entry.title: The Life Beyond Gotham
entry.summary:
Author: Lynna5555

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,948Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 150

Summary: Everyone knows Damian Wayne left Gotham to “find himself.” What no one knows is that he never planned to return. For years, the Batfamily waited—worried, hopeful, and increasingly unsure. His rare check-ins were brief, just enough to prove he was alive. But the truth behind his silence was far gentler than they imagined. During his travels, Damian met Marinette Dupain-Cheng—a talented designer whose warmth disarmed him more easily than any blade. Love wasn’t part of his training, yet with her it felt natural. Effortless. Inevitable. Paris wasn’t the place he chose. She was. What began quietly grew into a life bright enough to eclipse the shadows he carried. For the first time, Damian allowed himself to stay… and he never told his family. Now he lives a life they know nothing about—one filled with color, creation, and a girl who makes him forget the weight of his name. But secrets don’t stay buried forever, and the Batfamily is about to learn that the son they lost didn’t disappear. He simply found a reason not to come home.

entry.title: To Do Better Than Your Best [Because your best was never enough]
entry.summary:
Author: Fangirl_Who_Died

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,604Chapters: 10/15Kudos: 37

Summary: In the final moments that Bunnyx keeps coming back to while trying to stop the end of the world, she realizes that even with all of her powers, she cannot do it. She pinpoints the cause of it to Marinette deciding death was better than living. Of course, it isn't accurate. Worse comes to worst, and soon she has to take help from Damian Wayne, the not-so-civilian boyfriend of Marinette Dupain-Cheng. Will he be able to save her (and the world too)? Will she be able to save herself? Or:Marinette spirals deep into depression and self harm and eventually suicides.Bunnyx believes her death is what causes everybody else's death, so she gives Damian a chance to save her.But Damian's seen it happen last time. Who's to say it won't happen again? (Changed summary, title and a lot of other stuff, things went in a different direction)

entry.title: Heirs
entry.summary:
Author: otome_wandering

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 375,022Chapters: 25/78Kudos: 2,324

Summary: Marinette is the Star of the Order of the Miraculous, the still-in-training head, as well as the True Ladybug leading the Court of Miracles. After years at Hawkmoth's mercy, Marinette has decided that enough is enough and is reaching out to Batman, the detective of detectives to help her track down the villian's true identity. What better way to do this than a field trip to Gotham? Damian, the bloodson and heir to both the Cowl and the Demon's Head, wants nothing to do with the French Class who has won the Wayne Enterprises Summer Internship, yet his father insists he needs better interpersonal skills. He supposes it won't kill him to try to work with this supposedly skilled class president if it means that everyone will get off his back for being 'aggressively asocial' (although he will still keep NDAs on standby). A seal of fate, a blood right, and a hidden prophecy lead Marinette and Damian on a rollercoaster of emotions, humourous misunderstandings, comeuppance -- and marriage?! ___Basically my attempt at a soulmate AU, full of just about every Damianette cliche and trope I can think of. And some original lore to make it work. Updating Monthly Maribat Awards 2024 Winner

entry.title: The Curse
entry.summary:
Author: Leda_Lasombra

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,167Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 42

Summary: Ra's al Ghul made the mistake of using the Miraculous to grant a wish, creating the Lazarus Pit. The Universe demanded that balance and harmony be restored, and the world suffered as a result. However, its consequences were seen, and he and his entire lineage suffered, with the curse that the celestial guardian placed upon all who possess Al Ghul blood, and with it a beast was created. For years the secret was kept, the Order was lost, until the new celestial guardian assumed responsibility for the order, cleansing the corrupting magic generated by it. A demon with little time to maintain his sanity. A guardian with the weight of the Universe's balance on her shoulders. Two extremes that need to help each other to move forward.

entry.title: Under the moonlight
entry.summary:
Author: EaryMy

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,095Chapters: 5/5Kudos: 175

Summary: Marinette Dupain-Cheng has always hated liars，her life is made up of liesMarinette is the everyday heroine, no one denies itSelene has always been a great actress, her "Marinette" is so convincing that even she almost believed it，almost...------------------Peter Parker is a nerd, everyone knows thatPeter is Tony Stark's adopted son, only a few know thisPeterson is a great hacker, good enough to even deceive Tony Stark, stealing a lot of money, but maybe Tony knows this...------------------Damian Wayne is the illegitimate son of the richest man in the worldDamian is a confident boy, perhaps too muchDamian al Ghul is destined to lead the entire League of Assassin, accompanied by his most faithful allies, if ignoring the fact that both of them, like him, escaped from there...-------------------All three have a new life, all of them think that the other two are deadBut when they all had to go to the same city, their past surfaces again...

entry.title: Damian’s Immortal Time Travel Shenanigans
entry.summary:
Author: Leia_of_the_Meadows

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,514Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 52

Summary: Damian's life was finally steady, well as steady as a superheroes life can get. He was going to college, being invited to join in on some of the Justice League missions, and his family was being less insufferable. But then a spotted heroine had to throw everything he ever thought he knew into question. The Mage who crafted the miraculous started so well, but in the end, he made one mistake with the Bunny Miraculous, causing a chain reaction across time and space. It pulled miraculous holders from various times in history back to the beginning. Now, Damian has to deal with an annoying group of holders from multiple places and times as they try to figure out how to get back to their times. This is a duology, and can be read either simultaneously or one after another. This is Damian's POV.

entry.title: The after effects of An Akuma.
entry.summary:
Author: Fateofwar

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 38,172Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 470

Summary: The idea for this work goes to Lilavaporizer9000, some part might be similar.I have little knowing of The DC world as compared to the Heralds and enforcers reading this fanfic. Some characters might be ooc, and if you find any case do tell.And English is not my first language, so any mistake or error is purely due to intervention of the keyboard and my spite for the language if I have any. So, Damian Wayne needs a girlfriend. His family won't stop pestering him with a normal teen life, not after he told them it would be better to spend 24 hours in the asylum rather than in this place where everyone seems to be losing their brain cells.A normal girlfriend would shut them better than anything. Which proved more difficult than solving criminal cases and fighting a Superman with a kryptonite dagger.The second option is find a small group of humans to meet his needs. Which seems impossible considering his general distain for them, as Dick calls it. He is one for sure.Luckily there is a match. Marinette Dupin-Cheng. She’s intelligent, quiet, respectful of his boundaries— generally acceptable. Status: Cleaning. (Rewriting and cleaning grammar) Time line: Unknown
